docstring.long_description:
Use the MEASURE_READ_2450 block to return a measurement.

Requires a CONNECT_2450 block to create the connection.
docstring.short_description: Changes the measurement settings for the 2450.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_2450 block).

parameters.name: digits
parameters.description: Select the number of display digits.
